bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: I tried to download source package of libini_config and failed:
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): libini_config-1.3.0-29.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: Everytime
Steps to Reproduce: % sudo dnf download --source libini_config --disablerepo=\* --enablerepo=fedora --enablerepo=updates -v cachedir: /var/cache/dnf Loaded plugins: reposync, builddep, Query, config-manager, playground, versionlock, debuginfo-install, generate_completion_cache, download, protected_packages, copr, needs-restarting, noroot DNF version: 1.1.9 enabling fedora-source repository enabling updates-source repository repo: using cache for: fedora not found deltainfo for: Fedora 24 - x86_64 not found updateinfo for: Fedora 24 - x86_64 repo: using cache for: fedora-source not found deltainfo for: Fedora 24 - Source not found updateinfo for: Fedora 24 - Source repo: using cache for: updates-source not found deltainfo for: Fedora 24 - Updates Source repo: using cache for: updates fedora: using metadata from Thu Jun 16 17:40:48 2016. fedora-source: using metadata from Thu Jun 16 17:35:43 2016. updates-source: using metadata from Fri Jun 24 01:46:07 2016. updates: using metadata from Mon Jun 27 04:26:41 2016. Last metadata expiration check: 0:04:03 ago on Mon Jun 27 12:11:10 2016. --> Package : libini_config-1.3.0-29.fc24.i686 Source : ding-libs-0.6.0-29.fc24.src.rpm --> Package : libini_config-1.3.0-29.fc24.x86_64 Source : ding-libs-0.6.0-29.fc24.src.rpm No package ding-libs-0.6.0-29.fc24.src available. Exiting due to strict setting. Error: No package ding-libs-0.6.0-29.fc24.src available.
Actual results: Download failed.
Expected results: Download successful.
Additional info:
